se.idsec.signservice.integration.document.pdf.signpage

Class PdfSignPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.idsec.signservice.integration.document.pdf.signpage.PdfSignPage
  • Deprecated. 
    Use DefaultPdfSignaturePagePreparator instead

    @Deprecated
public class PdfSignPage
extends Object
    This class provides the basic logic for adding sign pages to PDF documents.

    The functions of this class is strictly speaking not a part of the sing service integration API. It is rather a helper class that may be used by the requesting e-service to generate the VisiblePdfSignatureRequirement requirements for a PDF document being signed.

    The PdfSignPage holds:

    • Information both about an optional extra sign page added to signed PDF document.
    • Reference to the sign image.
    • Logic for determining the signer name requirements.
    • Logic for determining the sign image placement.
    • Base placement for sign images.

    Based on this data, the PdfSignImage is a one stop shop both for adding a sign page and for adding sign images to a PDF document being signed.

    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

    • Constructor Detail

      • PdfSignPage

        public PdfSignPage(String signPageTemplateLocation,
                   boolean onlyAddedToUnsigned,
                   SignerNameRequirementProcessor signerNameRequirementProcessor,
                   SignatureImagePlacement basePlacement,
                   SignatureImagePlacementCalulator calulator,
                   String imageTemplate)
        Deprecated. 
        The default constructor returning a fully functional SignPage functionality. This constructor is used when the implementation intends to add a sign page with relative sign image placement to signed PDF documents.
        Parameters:
        signPageTemplateLocation - the location of the sign page template holding a valid PDF document where page 1 holds the template page
        onlyAddedToUnsigned - only add the sign page to unsigned documents
        signerNameRequirementProcessor - processor that determines the attributes and format for expressing signer name
        basePlacement - the base placement for sign images on the template page
        calulator - the calculator determining the change in position for each sign image relative to the number of current signatures. A null value creates a default calculator that always returns the base placement
        imageTemplate - the sign image template name

      • PdfSignPage

        public PdfSignPage(SignerNameRequirementProcessor signerNameRequirementProcessor,
                   SignatureImagePlacement basePlacement,
                   SignatureImagePlacementCalulator calulator,
                   String imageTemplate)
        Deprecated. 
        Constructs a sign page instance that never adds any sign page but places a sign image on the original PDF document at a defined location
        Parameters:
        signerNameRequirementProcessor - processor that determines the attributes and format for expressing signer name
        basePlacement - the base placement for sign images on the template page
        calulator - the calculator determining the change in position for each sign image relative to the number of current signatures. A null value creates a default calculator that always returns the base placement
        imageTemplate - the sign image template name

      • PdfSignPage

        public PdfSignPage()
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a NULL sign page that never adds a sign page and never adds a sign image

      • PdfSignPage

        public PdfSignPage(SignatureImagePlacement placement,
                   String imageTemplate)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a NULL sign page that never adds a sign page and always returns the base placement and default image template

        This constructor is intended for the situation where the PDF document to be signed:

        • already have a suitable location for adding the sign image without adding a sign page
        • never will be signed more than once
        Parameters:
        placement - base placement for sign images
        imageTemplate - the identifier for the sign image

        Deprecated. 
        Creates the visible signature requirements to forward to the sign service integration API.

        docBytes - bytes of the document to be signed
        docType - the type of document to sign
        signerAttrlist - list of attributes of the signer passed to the signature service
        imageParams - map of image parameters passed to the sign image in addition to name and time of signing
        Returns:
        the visible signature requirements
        Throws:
        IOException - on error
